editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: Itâ€™s hard to understate Clash of Clansâ€™ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobileâ€“we still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-travelling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp foes without spending any money or you buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercellâ€™s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package thatâ€™s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, thereâ€™s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: Dominate the lanes of this highly polished multiplayer online battle arena as a rocket-loving robot, a bunny-like mage or another unique hero from a list of dozens.
The cheerful humour of the Bikini Bottom crew keeps us smiling as we juggle orders in chaotic cooking challenges.

ios.subtitle: This game is not what it seems

editorialNotes.tagline: Will you be good or evil?
Ride it like you built it
editorialNotes.standard: No mere port of a pre-existing classic, this is a stunning reimagining of perhaps our most beloved business-building sim. We love snagging new card packs to build bigger and better rides, and our inner Walt Disney obsesses over the perfect placement of attractions, restaurants, and, of course, restroomsâ€”you never know when a customer is going to find one of our roller coaster creations a little too intense.
editorialNotes.short: Ride it like you built it

editorialNotes.standard: Presented as a holotable full of Star Wars champions, Galaxy of Heroes lets you form a team and leap into thrilling turn-based battles. Playing as Luke Skywalker, Boba Fett, Ahsoka Tano and other characters from the films and animated series, youâ€™ll need smart tactics to beat enemy squads. Missions take you from Hoth to Tatooine to Imperial shipsâ€”and gorgeous graphics make every sabre slash and blaster shot look spectacular. Even when youâ€™re not fighting, though, the piles of unlockable characters, gear and abilities ensure youâ€™ll have plenty to do.

editorialNotes.short: Enable the "Farm to Table" mode to play this relaxing idle game in a new way.
